infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires camera access to scan package barcodes and capture delivery photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires photo library access to select delivery proof photos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires location access to record GPS coordinates for package scans and deliveries.
